articles.title: Russia makes 'proposal' to France over jailed researcher
articles.mainIdea: Russia makes 'proposal' to France over jailed researcher
articles.summary: AFP: Russia makes 'proposal' to France over jailed researcher. Russia has made an offer to France regarding a jailed researcher facing espionage charges that could see him sentenced to 20 years in prison, the Kremlin said Thursday.Vinatier, 49, who works for a Swiss conflict mediation NGO, was jailed in June 2024 and is serving a three-year sentence for failing to register as a "foreign agent".

articles.title: Kevin O'Leary Warns $2,000 Cheques In 'Trump Accounts' Could Send Inflation Back To 9%: 'Terrible Idea'
articles.mainIdea: Kevin O'Leary Warns $2,000 Cheques In 'Trump Accounts' Could Send Inflation Back To 9%: 'Terrible Idea'
articles.summary: Benzinga: Kevin O'Leary Warns $2,000 Cheques In 'Trump Accounts' Could Send Inflation Back To 9%: 'Terrible Idea'. “Shark Tank” investor Kevin O'Leary has issued a stark warning regarding the proposed $2,000 “tariff dividend” cheques linked to the new ‘Trump Accounts’ initiative, labeling the concept “helicopter money” that risks reigniting the country’s battle with soaring inflation. Inflation Trap In a video shared by him on X, he reacted to the proposed payouts, arguing that the U.S. economy cannot afford another injection of unearned cash. articles.title: Stocks End Mildly Higher as Bullish Sentiment Continues
